channel.title: CUDA on Afnan Alabdulwahab
channel.description: Recent content in CUDA on Afnan Alabdulwahab

item.title: Accelerating Transformer Attention with Custom CUDA Kernels
item.description: An in-depth performance analysis of PyTorch's MultiheadAttention module, identifying computational bottlenecks and optimizing CUDA kernels for efficient GPU utilization.
